data.title: Mythopoeic Awards
data.meta_description: This is the list of nominees and winners as found on the homepage of the Mythopeic Awards for Fantasy. It includes both adult and children's titles. As you know, I like my fantasy for grown-ups as well as for children and many times, I prefer the nominees to the winner. This has become one of…
data.text:
This is the list of nominees and winners as found on the homepage of the Mythopeic Awards for Fantasy. It includes both adult and children’s titles. As you know, I like my fantasy for grown-ups as well as for children and many times, I prefer the nominees to the winner.

This has become one of my favorite awards to follow because while there is always a book I loved among the nominees, there are also always books I’d never heard about. And almost all of the nominees I have read have been excellent!

2024

Adult

Travis Baldree – Bookshops & Bonedust

Becky Chambers – Monk and Robot Series

A Psalm for the Wild-Built

A Prayer for the Crown-Shy

Heather Fawcett – Emily Wilde’s Encyclopaedia of Faeries

Emma Törzs – Ink Blood Sister Scribe
